issue.title: [C++] Add Timestamps to between ternary kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15093](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15093). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Need to compare timestamps and check for timezone information. This is a follow on issue to ARROW-9843  and has been addressed in another context in ARROW-13081

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15093?focusedCommentId=17471819) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This is already being addressed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11882?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15093?focusedCommentId=17471847) by Benson Muite (baksmj):*
Thanks. Will close this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15093?focusedCommentId=17585865) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
